document_data.name: Glyphimhor
document_data.mainbody: '''Glyphimhor''' was one of the most powerful lieutenants in the service of [[Orcus]] in the [[Abyss]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Glyphimhor ruled the metropolis of [[Orcusgate]] on the [[Layers of the Abyss]] ruled by Orcus. He knew the workings of the ''[[Wand of Orcus]]''.
document_data.Personality: Glyphimhor was a typical [[balor]]. He cared nothing for his subordinates but was worried if his city would be damaged. Usually Glyphimhor did not kill personally, preferring to use his ''[[symbol of discord]]'' and ''[[symbol of stunning]]'' or his ''[[telekinesis]]'' powers.
document_data.Relationship: Orcus trusted Glyphimhor but he was still a [[demon]] and if he found a truly successful chance Glyphimhor would betray his lord.
